actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an individual tax credit for disaster evacuation expenses.

summary.text: Provides an individual tax credit under the Internal Revenue Code for the expenses incurred due to the evacuation by a taxpayer of his principal residence because of a natural disaster or the threat of natural disaster. Limits such credit to $500 for each disaster.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide an individual tax credit for disaster evacuation expenses.
